title: Bodega Test Page 1: Instructions on Preparation of B.L.T. Sandwich
summary: This guide provides detailed instructions for the preparation of a B.L.T. (Bacon, Lettuce, Tomato) sandwich, including specific measurements for each ingredient based on the sandwich size.

tables.title: B.L.T. Sandwich Preparation Measurements
tables.description: This table provides the measurements in ounces for each ingredient (bacon, lettuce, tomato) required to prepare a B.L.T. sandwich, categorized by sandwich size (small, medium, large).

raw_content:
# Bodega Test Page 1
## Instructions on Preparation of B.L.T. Sandwich

*This guide is for the preparation of a B.L.T. (Bacon, Lettuce, Tomato) sandwich.*

| Sandwich Size | Bacon (Oz) | Lettuce (Oz) | Tomato (Oz) |
| ------------- | ---------- | ------------ | ----------- |
| Small         | 0.5        | 1            | 1           |
| Medium        | 1          | 2            | 2           |
| Large         | 2.5        | 3            | 2           |

**NOTE:** Mayo is optional.
